title: Logged in and had RP?
body: Not one to complain or anything about it, but I logged in today and I saw I'd gained around 1400 RP, and checked whats on hold and that nothing was purchased. So is there a bug? is it on my end our theirs?

replies.body: A few days ago, we had an issue where some players were experiencing an issue processing RP purchases.  It looks like you may have been affected, and we resolved the processing error for you.  If you still have any concerns or if this wasn't intended, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team will be happy to help you out!
